parameters.definition: Rate of equipment transportation by a cart
Number of workers required by a cart
Rate of equipment transportation by a trolley
Number of workers required by a trolley
Minimum number of trolleys to be used
Maximum percentage of the transportation that can be using trolleys

description: A concert organizer has to transport equipment using carts or trolleys. Carts can transport \param{CartRate} kg/min of equipment and requires \param{CartWorkers} workers. Trolleys can transport \param{TrolleyRate} kg/min of equipment and requires \param{TrolleyWorkers} workers. There must be at least \param{MinTrolleys} trolleys to be used. Additionally, only a maximum of \param{MaxTrolleyPercentage} of the transportation can be using trolleys. The organizer has to deliver at a rate of \param{DeliveryRate} kg/min of equipment. How many of each transportation method should be used to minimize the total number of workers?
